schema.description: The branch to use for the cosmetic index.
Whether to include the global extras (molang) in the response.
Whether to include particles in the response.
Whether to include cosmetics in the response.

constants.description: The Molang constants, for the cosmetic

functions.description: The Molang functions, for the cosmetic

molang.description: The Molang data for the cosmetic

description.description: Description of the Morph, usually the emote it's attributed to

morph.description: Stringified JSON object of the particle system

bone.description: The bone that the particle is attached to

start.description: The start frame of the particle in ticks

length.description: The length of the particle in ticks

fade_in.description: The length of the fade in of the particle in ticks

fade_out.description: The length of the fade out of the particle in ticks

translate.description: The X, Y, Z translation of the particle from the bone pivot

rotation.description: The X, Y, Z rotation of the particle from the bone pivot

scale.description: The X, Y, Z scale of the particle

morphs.description: Associated inner morphs (particle systems) of the whole morph

particles.description: Particles within the index for cosmetics

post.description: Requests a world host connect to a relay to accept a connection

hostUuid.description: Minecraft UUID of player hosting this world

relayAddress.description: Address of relay the world host should connect to

relayPort.description: Port of relay the world host should connect to

sessionId.description: Unique ID the world host should provide when connecting to the relay

joinerUuid.description: Minecraft UUID of the player joining this world

get.description: Loads privacy settings about who can join a Hosted World

schema.description: Minecraft UUID of player hosting the world

allowedJoinSources.description: Join sources that are allowed to connect to the Hosted World

friendUuids.description: Minecraft players who are friends with the host

whitelistedUuids.description: Minecraft players who are specifically whitelisted on this Hosted World

get.description: Lists active Hosted Worlds

hostUuid.description: Minecraft UUID of the world host

hostUsername.description: Minecraft username of the world host

maxPlayers.description: Max number of players allowed online

samplePlayers.description: Sample players to display on server list ping

startedAt.description: Time this world started to be hosted

schema.description: Active Hosted Worlds
